results.title: Heart of Otara
results.brief_description: Otara has the reputation as one of the most dangerous places in New Zealand. But for Sami, who now lives in Australia, Otara will always remain in his heart as home, as the land of his father and his family. Proud of his color and proud of his culture, Sami talks of his memories as a child, the good times and the bad including the tragic circumstances which eventually led to a new start and a new beginning in Australia. Music composed by Sami Laga.

results.title: Western stories: expressions for the future. [Vol. 1]
results.brief_description:
Western Stories: Expressions for the Future is an inspirational collection of works from young people who, through their association with the Western Chances program, have been given the opportunity to tell their stories and build their own bridge to the future.
Western Chances was established to ensure that financial hardship does not prevent a young person in Melbourne’s West from achieving their maximum potential in life.

results.title: Resident me-ville
results.creator_credit: Luke Jenkins, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Anything can happen in life
results.creator_credit: Zenebech Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Zenebech Tebeje reflects on growing up in her large family and how quickly life can change. But if you can adapt and embrace your new life, you can do anything.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Zenebech Tebeje, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Welcome to my nightmare
results.creator_credit: Zoero Theoharou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Zoero Theoharou delves back into a time when she felt lost, trapped in a cold nightmare of misery from which she couldn’t wake. The only release from this nightmare was through pain.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Zoero Theoharou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Zoero Theoharou delves back into a time when she felt lost, trapped in a cold nightmare of misery from which she couldn’t wake. The only release from this nightmare was through pain.

results.title: True friend
results.creator_credit: Elizabeth Phan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Moving to a new city and making new friends is never easy, and Elizabeth Phan found it particularly difficult. Gradually, though, Phan was able to learn the meaning of the words ‘true friend’.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Elizabeth Phan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Moving to a new city and making new friends is never easy, and Elizabeth Phan found it particularly difficult. Gradually, though, Phan was able to learn the meaning of the words ‘true friend’.

results.title: Sweet long ride
results.creator_credit: Linda Ellen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Laurie and Linda Ellen have taken holidays four times a year for the past thirty-four years. She reflects on the changes in their holidaying as well as some of the more enduring memories of their time away from home.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Linda Ellen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Laurie and Linda Ellen have taken holidays four times a year for the past thirty-four years. She reflects on the changes in their holidaying as well as some of the more enduring memories of their time away from home.
